metertools.make_binary¶

abjad.tools.metertools.make_binary(nonbinary_meter, contents_multiplier=Rational(1, 1))¶

Change nonbinary meter to binary. Return meter.

metertools.make_binary(Meter(3, 12)) Meter(2, 8)
